@tarastrong thats awful Tara. So sorry for all the hate thats going on. Stay strong â™¥
My Trump supporter customer was back today, wanted to tell me how pleased he was with all Trump has done this week. Did I miss something?

Every day the news about Trump gets more bizarre and terrifying. And this is only week one.

@kiwi_local nice and calm and sunny at the moment!
@kiwi_local oh wow that is gorgeous!

I moved to Karori two years ago today. What a great two years its been
@DelilahRose77 good night to be at home with a hot drink
Hartnell is such a grizzly old Doctor but hes awesome
Swan plants took quite a beating today, lost a few more branches. They've been through worse though theyll be ok
How is everyone on this miserable night
@MelEHart worth it for fresh veges!
@MelEHart just another Wellington summer day
There will be tough times ahead, for everybody. Just remember to look out for each other. This is our opportunity to be bigger on the inside
How quickly the lessons of history are forgotten
Plato predicting much of what is happening in America in describing the fall of the Democratic State is not much comfort
I fear the inauguration has somehow validated something awful, inside more people than we realise
A worryingly high number of people I served at work today felt the need to tell me how happy they were that Trump was now President
@meriamber wicked cool makeup
Confirmed yesterday that the family of ruru are still nesting in the same spot and look to be doing well

@tarastrong keep doing what you're doing Tara you are fantastic â™¥

@zealandia up in semi forested area in West Karori. There were two (I assume) parents also but they were sleeping
@Jewel_Lia thanks it was awesome to see them all just sitting up in the tree staring at me. Such a great surprise
Better res pic of the baby Ruru in Karori today https://t.co/CUkgfDbEr6
@lyallbaynz for sure. We definitely have something special in Wellington.
What a stunning Wellington day. 10km walk from Evans Bay round the coast to Seatoun https://t.co/hRpcQSH9KY
Guys something very special to share today; came across a family of Ruru while I was walking home! (Halo effect froâ€¦ https://t.co/Uq7bCaBBKu
Planning a 10km walk tomorrow. Mostly flat coastal walk nothing too major to get back into it. Feels like its been forever
Stop monkeying around, it's time for war! https://t.co/7mxo6W6pEK
@TheZoneNZ Has to be Rogue One

Woop bring it on! #12Monkeys #Grimm #Shannara https://t.co/5CDumwmhdq
@MelEHart it had a good run. Wind ripped it apart this morning. Frame is still good so might modify it to grow beans or something
Well my little greenhouse lasted two years of Karori winds but finally gave in this morning.
Nothing better to herald in 2017 that fog and gale force winds
Maybe my favourite bird encounter of 2016; NZ Falcon outside the Zealandia Perimeter near Wrights Hill https://t.co/tlGbFZ5iJV
Awesome bay life of 2016; Seals, skinks and dolphins #wellingtonwildlife #LyallBay #RedRocks https://t.co/1LajBVKxL2
A nice achievement of 2016; climbing Hawkins Hill, 495m high https://t.co/20hxWbvHco
To all of you I havent thanked yet, thankyou for being fantastic.
I have more people to thank but probably not tonight
To @zealandia you have been my happy place this year. The work you do is incredible and I will be making many more visits in 2017. Thankyou.
To @kiwi_local and @Cheyns_k your stunning photos have been an inspiration and a joy. I wish you the best for the new year.
To @TheZoneNZ and the #CinemaZ gang I cant wait to rip into another steaming pile of Z-grade goodness in 2017. You guys rock.
To @meriamber and @KalaGeneral , your music has been my soundtrack to 2016 and a comfort and retreat in some unpleasant times. Thankyou.
To @Armageddonexpo , I dont know how you do it but each year you outdo the last. Thankyou for your tireless work and look forward to 2017
Despite 2016 being full of crap, here are some shoutouts to people that helped to make it somewhat bearable...
@meriamber thats an awesome song Meri and super catchy as always :) Thankyou for making me a part of it!
Did I miss something or were a lot of the scenes from the #Rogueone trailors absent from the movie?
Might have to go see #RogueOne again I think
#RogueOne #nospoilers AWESOME movie. Not without criticism but overall thoroughly enjoyed it. Jyn Erso WOW â¤â¤â¤

@ImDanaDeLorenzo Kelly is the best! What an awesome season absolutely loved it

Looking back on the week we've all had still feels surreal
Sorry Amy I love you but introducing the opening credits in S6 is just so so wrong #DrWho
Sick of this damn wind
@Cheyns_k love the colours. Beautiful photo
@kiwi_local ill bet. Our poor city! I work in lower hutt though and practically nothing is open there yet
@kiwi_local yeah getting there thanks. Home was ok but work pretty trashed. Normal never seemed so nice!
The worst of times always brings out the best in people. This is why I love New Zealand, this is why I love Wellington. You're all fantastic
Big thanks to @metlinkwgtn for keeping public transport going as much as possible in difficult circumstances past few days
@WeatherWatchNZ thanks for your efforts keeping us updated!
Here Wellington, take your mind off earthquakes and flooding for a few minutes. Great song! #TeamLove https://t.co/pKU8sYYUUE
@MelEHart i tried to get in to work to clean up but sh2 closed
Hope everyone is doing a bit better tonight. I had another day of no work, this time due to flooding. Maybe back to semi normal tomorrow
